build.description: Generate a FAB given the config (usually in fab.config.json5)

skip-cache.name: skip-cache
skip-cache.description: Skip any caching of intermediate build artifacts

watch.name: watch
watch.description: Re-run the builder if any of the listed files change. Pass this argument multiple times to watch multiple files/directories.

skip-typecheck.name: skip-typecheck
skip-typecheck.description: Skip the background typechecking of your FAB plugins if it's slow or flaky.

deploy.description: Deploy a FAB to a hosting provider

package-dir.name: package-dir
package-dir.description: Where to save the packaged FAB files (default .fab/deploy)

server-host.name: server-host
server-host.description: If you have multiple potential hosts for the server defined in your fab.config.json5, which one to deploy to.

assets-host.name: assets-host
assets-host.description: If you have multiple potential hosts for the assets defined in your fab.config.json5, which one to deploy to.

env.name: env
env.description: Override production settings with a different environment defined in your FAB config file.

assets-already-deployed-at.name: assets-already-deployed-at
assets-already-deployed-at.description: Skip asset deploys and only deploy the server component pointing at this URL for assets

assets-only.name: assets-only
assets-only.description: Skip server deploy, just upload assets

auto-install.name: auto-install
auto-install.description: If you need dependent packages (e.g. @fab/deploy-*), install them without prompting

init.description: Auto-configure a repo for generating FABs

yes.name: yes
yes.description: Assume yes to all prompts (must be in the root directory of a project)

skip-install.name: skip-install
skip-install.description: Do not attempt to npm install anything

version.name: version
version.description: What NPM version or dist-tag to use for installing FAB packages

skip-framework-detection.name: skip-framework-detection
skip-framework-detection.description: Don't try to auto-detect framework, set up manually.

empty.name: empty
empty.description: Install the packages and create an empty fab.config.json5 (implies -y)

package.description: Package a FAB to be uploaded to a hosting provider manually

target.name: target
target.description: Hosting provider (must be one of: cf-workers, aws-lambda-edge, aws-s3)

output-path.name: output-path
output-path.description: Where to save the packaged FAB (default .fab/deploy/[target].zip)

assets-url.name: assets-url
assets-url.description: A URL for where the assets can be accessed, for server deployers that need it

env.name: env
env.description: Override production settings with a different environment defined in your FAB config file.

serve.description: fab serve: Serve a FAB in a local NodeJS Express server

experimental-v8-sandbox.name: experimental-v8-sandbox
experimental-v8-sandbox.description: Enable experimental V8::Isolate Runtime (in development, currently non-functional)

env.name: env
env.description: Override production settings with a different environment defined in your FAB config file.

config.name: config
config.description: Path to config file. Only used for SETTINGS in conjunction with --env.

auto-install.name: auto-install
auto-install.description: If you need dependent packages (e.g. @fab/serve), install them without prompting

watch.name: watch
watch.description: EXPERIMENTAL: Watches fab.zip and restarts the server when it changes.

proxy-ws.name: proxy-ws
proxy-ws.description: EXPERIMENTAL: Proxy websocket requests to a different port
